title: Broadway's Lost Treasures II DVD5 - 18 Musical Moments from Tony
description:
Broadway's Lost Treasures II DVD5 - 18 Musical Moments from Tony Awards [DDR]

CAST:-
Regina Ahlgren 
Bea Arthur 
Lauren Bacall
Brent Barrett
Walter Bobbie
Nell Carter
Michael Cline
Melissa Haizlip
George Hearn
Gregory Hines
Michael Jeter
Richard Kiley
Angela Lansbury
Jane Lapotaire
Patti LuPone 

A second collection of great performances from the Tony Awards. Some of the classics of the Broadway stage have been lost to history - except for the archives of the American Theatre Wing and its collection of films of the Tony Awards ceremonies. Performances in the on-air version included 

01. "Anything Goes" from the 1987 revival of _Anything Goes
02. "Bosom Buddies" from _Mame 
03. "I Believe in You" from the original production of _How To Succeed in Business Without Really Trying
04. "La Vie En Rose" from _Piaf_, "The Impossible Dream" from the original production of _Man of La Mancha
05. "Take A Glass Together" from _Grand Hotel
06. "That's How You Jazz" from _Jelly's Last Jam
07. "Sit Down, You're Rockin' the Boat" from the 1992 revival of _Guys and Dolls
08. "We Are What We Are/I Am What I Am" from _La Cage Aux Folles
09. "Les Miserables Medley", 
10. "You'll Never Walk Alone" from the 1994 revival of _Carousel
11. "All I Care About" from the original production of _Chicago

Broadway's Lost Treasures II contains 90 minutes of memorable moments and performances from the various Tony-award telecasts throughout the years. Included on this edition are performances from such famous productions as Man of La Mancha, Chicago, Guys and Dolls, and Anything Goes. Such notables as Gregory Hines, Patti LuPone, Michael Jeter, Nathan Lane, and Jerry Orbach take part in the proceedings.
